cause.description:
When Travis Austin Huse becomes the man in '08, here is what he will work for:
-An end to the drug war. It's unnecessary and it costs us a ton! -Complete and utter isolationism. Who cares? -I will make Tu B'Shevat a national holiday, replacing Presidents' Day. Why should we have a day honoring someone who gets paid to be the most powerful man in the world? Seems like they already get enough publicity, ifyouknowwhaddimean! -Families choosing not to have children will get an extra tax break. It's responsibility, guys. This way, instead of having shitty little brats, you can go kayaking! -Stem Cell research is a go! -I will make anything that does not harm others legal. -I will wear a crown made by none other than Paul Wall. -I will surgically enhance my height so that I am one inch taller than Shaq, and will gloat that while I have height, I can also make freethrows.
1. Travis Huse for prez.
2. Michael J. Fox for veep.
3. A swift end to the unjust pizza tax.
cause.mission: get TH in the White House!
cause.name: Travis Huse for President '08
